title: Amavas
description: This ebook contains two short stories:AMAVASMinal is petrified. She has just discovered that her family is irretrievably linked to the serial killings that have been terrorising Delhi for the past four new moons. Each new moon (amavas) has brought slit throats. Tomorrow will be another amavas. Minal must do everything she can to save her family.GULSHAN PANDEYAbhinav, a journalist, has always wanted to experience prison first hand, even if it is just for a day. When an opportunity comes up, he is delighted. But is he tempting fate?
author: R.V. Raman
